title: Generator Annual Load Test
description: Annual load bank test at full rated capacity for 4 hours. Transfer switch tested and calibrated. All emergency circuits verified. Test passed.

title: Annual Mower Service
description: Full service including blade sharpening oil change air filter spark plug belt inspection. Deck leveled and calibrated.

title: Camera System Firmware Update & Calibration
description: Updated firmware on all 64 cameras. Recalibrated pan-tilt-zoom units in parking garage. Replaced 3 failed camera housings. DVR backup verified.

title: Floor Scrubber Service
description: Replaced squeegee blades and scrub brushes. Battery capacity test - at 78% recommend replacement within 12 months. Charger tested OK.

title: Pool Vacuum Service
description: Cleaned debris canister replaced filter bag inspected drive tracks and brushes. Tested in pool - operating normally.

title: Boom Lift Annual Inspection
description: ANSI A92.20 annual inspection. Hydraulic cylinders tested. Platform gate latch replaced. Ground control panel tested. Inspection sticker issued.

title: Box Truck 50K Mile Service
description: Oil filter brake inspection tire rotation alignment. Rear door seal replaced. AC recharged. New wipers. All systems operational.

title: Pressure Washer Pump Repair
description: Pump seal failure causing pressure loss. Replaced pump seals unloader valve and spray gun. Tested at 3500 PSI - operating normally.

title: Generator Semi-Annual Inspection
description: 6-month preventive service. Oil and coolant levels checked. Battery load tested - replaced one weak cell. Transfer switch exercised. All load circuits verified.

title: Golf Cart Annual Service
description: Battery water levels topped off. Tire pressure adjusted. Brake adjustment. Charging profile recalibrated. Canopy support tightened.
